query:
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.role, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_accounts a WHERE a.userId = u.id) as accountCount
FROM users u 
WHERE u.email = 'vip@mucers.com';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.role, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_accounts a WHERE a.userId = u.id) as accountCount
FROM users u 
WHERE u.email = 'vip@mucers.com';
